definition: Celestial Empire, tributary title conferred on imperial China/Taiping Heavenly Kingdom
abbr. for 朝鮮|朝鲜[Chao2 xian3] Korea
imperial or royal court/government/dynasty/reign of a sovereign or emperor/court or assembly held by a sovereign or emperor/to make a pilgrimage to/facing/towards

sentences.english: He has been pressing to return to China to advocate for greater cultural and religious freedoms for his followers.
sentences.chinese: 他一直努力回到天朝为他的信徒争取文化和总角子有。

sentences.english: Of course, many developing countries are envious of China's rise.
sentences.chinese: 当然，有很多发展中国家对天朝之崛起可谓分外眼红。

sentences.english: Make them to be numbered with thy Saints in glory everlasting.
sentences.chinese: 使我们加入天朝神圣的行列，永享光荣。

sentences.english: A plait hundreds of years, close a door to build a car to play, ascend country a day a dynasty greatness.
sentences.chinese: 一条辫子数百年，关着门造着车玩，上国天朝何伟大。

sentences.english: During the time of the last pole shift this occurred of record in China.
sentences.chinese: 在上次极移期间，发生过，并且在天朝有案可查。

sentences.english: In 1126, Koreans partook the Imperial System with the Jin Dynasty at its center.
sentences.chinese: 1126年高丽进入以金朝为中心的天朝体系里。

sentences.english: The lanky Europe, cannot stop our Kingdom of Heaven's gold armored soldiers and iron horses.
sentences.chinese: 瘦瘦的欧罗巴，挡不住天朝的金戈铁马。

sentences.english: During the time of the last pole shift, this occurred, of record, in China.
sentences.chinese: 在上次极移岁月，发生过，并且在天朝有案可查。
每一话都是大实话，天朝啊，哎。

sentences.english: In the beginning God created the Party and Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 在一切的最初，神创造了天朝与魔都。

sentences.english: It allotted them five “treaty ports” through which they could conduct commerce with the Celestial Empire.
sentences.chinese: 开放五个“通商口岸”可使英国人与天朝上国做贸易。

sentences.english: For the Chinese, the United States looks increasingly like a banana republic by comparison.
sentences.chinese: 对天朝子民，美帝乍看之下，愈来愈想一香蕉共和国。

definition: island nation (sometimes refers specifically to Japan)
common term for non-Han peoples in former times, not exclusively derogatory/barbarian
Han Dynasty term for the Roman Empire 羅馬帝國|罗马帝国[Luo2 ma3 Di4 guo2]
Korean Goryeo dynasty, 918-1392/Korea, esp. in context of art and culture
Han Chinese name for an ancient Central Asia country
Ryūkyū/refers to the Ryūkyū Islands 琉球群島|琉球群岛[Liu2 qiu2 Qun2 dao3] stretching from Japan to Taiwan/Liuchiu township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
